patterns: What is a Service Now request?
responses: Found on /intranet it allows you to make service requests, gain access to applications, and submit software installation requests.
Status 20 means a new loan application has been created
New loan application created.
Status 30 means that the contract offer has been created
Contract offer created.
Status 40 means that the loan contract has been created
Loan contract created.
Status 50 means that the application is under review of the underwriter
Application under underwriter review.
Status 60 means that the requisition has been received
Requisition received.
Status 70 means documents incomplete for conventional loans.
Incomplete conventional loans.

patterns: What is one of the factors that will change the LTV %?
responses: Loan-to-Value ratio. You would divide the mortgage amount over the property value.
Loan-to-Value ratio (LTV): factors like mortgage amount and property affect this %.

patterns: What is one of the factors that will change the TDS %?
responses: Total Debt Service. It's the % of your income needed to cover all your debts

patterns: What is the range of CBS scores?
responses: CBS stands for Credit Bureau Score. Its rating ranges from 280 to 900. Usually a score of 600+ is considered to be good.

patterns: What SAP applications should I use for updating CBS?
responses:
1. Finding loan details: Manage Loan Contract 
  2.Updation of CBS/MOS: Maintain BP 
  3. Link a property to an existing loan: Property 
  4. Creation of a new loan contract: Create Mortgage contract
